trans-unit.source: Desktop applications are required to opt in to all earlier accessibility improvements to get the later improvements. To do this, ensure that if the AppContext switch 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.N' is set to 'false', then 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures' and all 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.M' switches, when M < N, evaluate to false as well. Note that, if a switch for a particular set of accessibility improvements is not present, its value is determined by the target framework version. You can remedy this by adding these switches and setting their value to false.
trans-unit.target: 需要桌面应用程序才可选择使用所有早期辅助功能改进实现后续改进。为此，请确保如果 AppContext 开关 "Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.N" 设置为 "false"，则在 M 小于 N 时，"Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures" 和所有 "Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.M" 也求值为 false。请注意，如果没有针对一组特别辅助功能改进的开关，则其值由目标框架版本决定。可通过添加这些开关并将其值设置为 false 来解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the AllowUserToResizeRows property changes.
trans-unit.target: AllowUserToResizeRows 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the GridColor property changes.
trans-unit.target: GridColor 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the MultiSelect property changes.
trans-unit.target: MultiSelect 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the ReadOnly property changes.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Owning DataGridViewRow object is already set.
trans-unit.target: 已设置所属 DataGridViewRow 对象。

trans-unit.source: Owning DataGridViewRow object has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 尚未设置所属 DataGridViewRow 对象。

trans-unit.source: Rows cannot be programmatically added to the DataGridView's rows collection when the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 当控件被数据绑定时，无法以编程方式向 DataGridView 的行集合中添加行。

trans-unit.source: Selected row cannot be added to or inserted into the DataGridView control. The row must be deselected first.
trans-unit.target: 无法向 DataGridView 控件中添加或插入选定的行。必须首先取消该行的选定状态。

trans-unit.source: Uncommitted new row cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 无法删除未提交的新行。

trans-unit.source: Rows collection cannot be programmatically cleared when the DataGridView control is data-bound to anything else than an IBindingList that supports change notification and allows deletion.
trans-unit.target: 当 DataGridView 控件被数据绑定到支持更改通知并允许删除的 IBindingList 以外的其他对象时，无法以编程方式清除行集合。

trans-unit.source: Rows cannot be programmatically removed unless the DataGridView is data-bound to an IBindingList that supports change notification and allows deletion.
trans-unit.target: 除非 DataGridView 被数据绑定到支持更改通知并允许删除的 IBindingList，否则不能以编程方式移除行。

trans-unit.source: Number of copies to create must be strictly positive.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的副本数必须为正。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration already finished.
trans-unit.target: 枚举已完成。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration has not started. Call MoveNext.
trans-unit.target: 枚举尚未开始。请调用 MoveNext。

trans-unit.source: Index of the destination row is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 目标行的索引超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Index of the row to copy is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的行索引超出范围。

trans-unit.source: No row can be added to a DataGridView control that does not have columns. Columns must be added first.
trans-unit.target: 不能向没有列的 DataGridView 控件添加行。必须首先添加列。

trans-unit.source: No row can be inserted after the uncommitted new row.
trans-unit.target: 不能在未提交的新行后插入行。

trans-unit.source: No row exists to make a copy of. A first row must be added to the DataGridView control before you can add copies of it.
trans-unit.target: 没有可创建副本的行。需要先向 DataGridView 控件中添加一行，然后才能添加行的副本。

trans-unit.source: Row index provided is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 提供的行索引超出范围。

trans-unit.source: The RowTemplate row contains more cells than there are columns.
trans-unit.target: RowTemplate 行包含的单元格比列多。

trans-unit.source: Provided row contains more cells than there are columns.
trans-unit.target: 提供的行中包含的单元格数比列多。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle property changes.
trans-unit.target: RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the column that contains row headers is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否显示包含行标题的列。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the RowHeadersWidth property changes.
trans-unit.target: RowHeadersWidth 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the RowsDefaultCellStyle property changes.
trans-unit.target: RowsDefaultCellStyle 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Sorted ascending by {0}.
trans-unit.target: 按 {0} 进行升序排列。

trans-unit.source: Sorted descending by {0}.
trans-unit.target: 按 {0} 进行降序排列。

trans-unit.source: The owning DataGridView control is already set.
trans-unit.target: 所属 DataGridView 控件已经设置。

trans-unit.source: The owning DataGridView control has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 所属 DataGridView 控件尚未设置。

trans-unit.source: Value provided for CellTemplate must be of type {0} or derive from it.
trans-unit.target: 为 CellTemplate 提供的值必须是 {0} 类型或其派生类型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 指示您是否已经为 DataGridView 控件提供了自己的数据管理操作。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the DataGridView control's columns has no cell template.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控件中至少有一列没有单元格模板。

trans-unit.target: 左上方标题单元格

trans-unit.target: 右上方标题单元格

trans-unit.target: 首行

trans-unit.target: 垂直

trans-unit.source: Property {0} cannot be set to the advanced cell border style provided.
trans-unit.target: 不能将属性 {0} 设置为提供的高级单元格边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the option to add rows is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否向用户显示用于添加行的选项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the user is allowed to delete rows from the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否允许用户从 DataGridView 删除行。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether manual column repositioning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否启用手动列重新放置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether users can resize columns.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户是否可以调整列的大小。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether users can resize rows.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户是否可以调整行的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: 应用于奇数行的默认单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the provided columns is null.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一个提供的列为空。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the provided rows is null.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一个提供的行为空。

trans-unit.source: Determines the auto size mode for the visible columns.
trans-unit.target: 确定可见列的自动调整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: Determines the auto size mode for the visible rows.
trans-unit.target: 确定可见行的自动调整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: Operation is not valid because it results in a reentrant call to the BeginEdit function.
trans-unit.target: 操作无效，原因是它导致对 BeginEdit 函数的可重入调用。

trans-unit.source: The border style for the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The flat style appearance of the button cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 列中的按钮单元格的平面样式外观。

trans-unit.source: The default text displayed on the button cell.
trans-unit.target: 按钮单元格中显示的默认文本。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否将 DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text 属性值显示为此列中单元格的按钮文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of a DataGridView control is true and a row edit should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 当 DataGridView 控件的 DataGridView.VirtualMode 属性为 true 并且应该取消行编辑时发生。

trans-unit.source: Visible column cannot be added because its AutoSize mode is Fill, and the column is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加可见列，原因是它的 AutoSize 模式为 Fill，而该列被冻结。

trans-unit.source: Visible column cannot be added because its AutoSize mode includes its header, and the column headers are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加可见列，原因是它的 AutoSize 模式包括它的标头，而列标头不可见。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be added because it is frozen and placed after an unfrozen column.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加该列，原因是它被冻结并被置于未冻结的列之后。

trans-unit.source: Row cannot be added because it is frozen and placed after an unfrozen row.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加该行，原因是它被冻结并被置于未冻结的行之后。

trans-unit.source: At least two provided columns are identical. Each provided column must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 提供的列中至少有两列完全相同。提供的每一列都必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: At least two provided rows are identical. Each provided row must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 提供的行中至少有两行完全相同。提供的每一行都必须是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be added because it is unfrozen and placed before a frozen column.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加该列，原因是它未冻结并被置于冻结的列之前。

trans-unit.source: Row cannot be added because it is unfrozen and placed before a frozen row.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加该行，原因是它未冻结并被置于冻结的行之前。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be added because its CellType property is null.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加该列，原因是它的 CellType 属性为空。

trans-unit.source: This operation cannot be performed while an auto-filled column is being resized.
trans-unit.target: 为自动填充列调整大小期间不能执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: This operation cannot be performed while the DisplayIndex of a column is being adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 在调整列的 DisplayIndex 时不能执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Columns AutoSize mode cannot be set to Fill because at least one visible column would inherit this AutoSize mode and is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 列 AutoSize 模式不能设置为 Fill，原因是至少有一个可见列将继承此 AutoSize 模式并被冻结。

trans-unit.source: Columns AutoSize mode cannot be based exclusively on the headers because the column headers are invisible and at least one visible column would inherit this AutoSize mode.
trans-unit.target: 列 AutoSize 模式不能只基于标头，原因是列标头不可见且至少有一个可见列将继承此 AutoSize 模式。

trans-unit.source: Column AutoSize mode cannot be based exclusively on the header because the column headers are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 列 AutoSize 模式不能只基于标头，原因是列标头不可见。

trans-unit.source: Row AutoSize mode cannot be based on the row headers alone while they are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 在行标头不可见时，行 AutoSize 模式不能只基于行标头。

trans-unit.source: Rows AutoSize mode cannot be based on the row headers alone while they are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 在行标头不可见时，行 AutoSize 模式不能只基于行标头。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be made visible because its AutoSize mode includes its header and the column headers are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 无法显示该列，原因是它的 AutoSize 模式包括其标头，但列标头不可见。

trans-unit.source: Frozen column cannot be moved after an unfrozen column.
trans-unit.target: 不能将冻结的列移到未冻结的列之后。

trans-unit.source: Unfrozen column cannot be moved before a frozen column.
trans-unit.target: 不能将未冻结的列移到冻结的列之前。

trans-unit.source: ColumnCount property cannot be set on a data-bound DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 不能在数据绑定的 DataGridView 控件上设置 ColumnCount 属性。

trans-unit.source: RowCount property cannot be set on a data-bound DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 不能在数据绑定的 DataGridView 控件上设置 RowCount 属性。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView control must be bound to an IBindingList object to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控件必须绑定到 IBindingList 对象才能排序。

trans-unit.source: Exception property is not set to a valid exception. ThrowException cannot be set to true.
trans-unit.target: Exception 属性未设置为有效异常。ThrowException 不能设置为 true。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView control is data-bound. The control cannot use the comparer to perform the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控件被数据绑定。该控件不能使用比较器来执行排序操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode starts for the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定单元格的编辑模式启动时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the border style of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格边框样式更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The cell border style for the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 的单元格边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Operation did not succeed because the program cannot commit or quit a cell value change.
trans-unit.target: 由于程序无法提交或取消单元格值更改，操作失败。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any part of the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格的任意部分时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格的内容时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user double-clicks a cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 用户双击单元格的内容时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip property changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's context menu strip is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要单元格的上下文菜单条时发生。

trans-unit.source: Provided cell does not belong to this DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的单元格不属于此 DataGridView 控件。

trans-unit.source: Operation can only be performed on cells that belong to a DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 只能在属于 DataGridView 控件的单元格上执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks anywhere in a cell.
trans-unit.target: 用户双击单元格中的任意位置时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定单元格的编辑模式停止时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell receives input focus, becoming the current cell in the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: 当单元格收到输入焦点，从而成为 DataGridView 中的当前单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewCell.ErrorText property of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的 DataGridViewCell.ErrorText 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要单元格的错误文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 需要设置单元格内容的显示格式时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格失去输入焦点并且不再是当前单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever a mouse clicks anywhere on a cell.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格中的任意位置单击鼠标时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell within the DataGridView is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 双击 DataGridView 中的单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is within the boundaries of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在鼠标指针位于单元格边界内时按鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针进入单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves a cell.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针离开单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves over the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针移过 DataGridView 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while over a cell.
trans-unit.target: 用户在单元格上方释放鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: Cell is not in a DataGridView. The cell cannot retrieve the inherited cell style.
trans-unit.target: 单元格不在 DataGridView 中。无法检索继承的单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 需要绘制单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user leaves edit mode, regardless of whether the value of the current cell has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 用户离开编辑模式(无论当前单元格的值是否已修改)时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: 单元格状态更改(例如单元格失去或获得焦点)时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewCell.Style property of a DataGridViewCell changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCell 的 DataGridViewCell.Style 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格样式的某个值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText property value changes for a cell in the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 中某一单元格的 DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed by the ToolTip associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: 由与此单元格关联的工具提示显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要单元格的工具提示文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 单元格完成验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell is validating.
trans-unit.target: 单元格验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of the DataGridView control is true and the DataGridView requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控件的 DataGridView.VirtualMode 属性为 true 并且 DataGridView 需要单元格的值以便设置单元格格式并显示单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of the DataGridView control is true, and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控件的 DataGridView.VirtualMode 属性为 true 且单元格值已更改并需要基础数据源中的存储时发生。

trans-unit.source: The underlying value corresponding to a cell value of false, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: 与单元格值 false (显示为未选中的框)对应的基础值。

trans-unit.source: The flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: 复选框单元格的平面样式外观。

trans-unit.source: The underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or null cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 与不确定或空单元格值(显示为禁用的复选框)对应的基础值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: 指示寄宿的复选框单元格是否将允许三个复选状态，而不是两个复选状态。

trans-unit.source: The underlying value corresponding to a cell value of true, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: 与单元格值 true (显示为选中的框)对应的基础值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the Clipboard and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户是否可以将单元格文本值复制到剪贴板，以及是否包含行标题和列标题文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 将列添加到控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Provided column already belongs to the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的列已属于 DataGridView 控件。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView column bound to a read-only field must have ReadOnly set to True.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到只读字段的 DataGridView 列必须将 ReadOnly 设置为 True。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip property of a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 列的 DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu for the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 列的 DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source property or database column to which the DataGridViewColumn is bound.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewColumn 绑定到的数据源属性或数据库列的名称。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 列的 DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 列的默认单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value the DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 列的 DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: 用户双击两列之间的分隔符时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth 更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The width of the column divider in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 列分隔符的宽度(以像素为单位)。

trans-unit.source: Column provided does not belong to this DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的列不属于此 DataGridView 控件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a column will move when a user scrolls the DataGridView control horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户水平滚动 DataGridView 控件时列是否将移动。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a column header cell change.
trans-unit.target: 列标题单元格的内容更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击列标题时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column header is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 双击列标题时发生。

trans-unit.source: The caption text on the column's header cell.
trans-unit.target: 列标题单元格的标题文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 应用于列标题的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Column headers cannot be made invisible because at least one column uses its header in its AutoSize mode.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 检索对话框中所有选定文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether extensions are automatically added to file names.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否将扩展名自动添加到文件名上。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the specified file exists before returning from the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 在从对话框返回之前，检查指定的文件是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the specified path exists before returning from the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 在从对话框返回之前，检查指定的路径是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The default file name extension. If the user types a file name, this extension is added at the end of the file name if one is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 默认的文件扩展名。当用户键入文件名时，如果未指定扩展名，将在文件名后添加此扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether shortcuts are dereferenced before returning from the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 控制在从对话框返回之前是否取消引用快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The file first shown in the dialog box, or the last one selected by the user.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the Open or Save button in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在对话框中单击“打开”或“保存”按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The file filters to display in the dialog box, for example, "C# files|*.cs|All files|*.*".
trans-unit.target: 对话框中显示的文件筛选器，例如，“C# 文件|*.cs|所有文件|*.*”。

trans-unit.source: The index of the file filter selected in the dialog box. The first item has an index of 1.
trans-unit.target: 对话框中选定的文件筛选器的索引。第一项的索引为 1。

trans-unit.source: The initial directory for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 对话框的初始目录。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the dialog box restores the current directory before closing.
trans-unit.target: 控制对话框在关闭之前是否恢复当前目录。

trans-unit.source: Enables the Help button.
trans-unit.target: 启用“帮助”按钮。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether multi-dotted extensions are supported.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否支持多点扩展。

trans-unit.source: The string to display in the title bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 将显示在对话框标题栏中的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the dialog box ensures that file names do not contain invalid characters or sequences.
trans-unit.target: 控制对话框是否确保文件名中不包含无效的字符或序列。

trans-unit.target: 文件 {0} 不存在。 是否创建文件?

trans-unit.target: 文件 {0} 不存在。 请验证是否给出了正确的文件名。

trans-unit.source: File {0} is not a valid file name.
trans-unit.target: 文件 {0} 是无效的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Filter string you provided is not valid. The filter string must contain a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. The strings for different filtering options must also be separated by the vertical bar. Example: "Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*"
trans-unit.target: 提供的筛选器字符串无效。筛选器字符串必须包含筛选器的说明，后跟竖线(|)和筛选模式。不同筛选选项的字符串还必须以竖线分隔。例如:“文本文件(*.txt)|*.txt|所有文件(*.*)|*.*”

trans-unit.source: Filter index not valid.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器索引无效。

trans-unit.target: 没有足够的内存。对列表框进行子分类的尝试失败。

trans-unit.target: 只能在 SupportsFiltering 为 true 的 IBindingListView 上设置筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Key specified was either empty or null.

trans-unit.source: The accept button of the form. If this is set, the button is 'clicked' whenever the user presses the 'ENTER' key.

trans-unit.source: Splitter control must be docked left, right, top, or bottom.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器控件必须停靠在左侧、右侧、顶部或底部。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the tabs appear on the top, bottom, left, or right side of the Control (left or right are implicitly multilined).

trans-unit.source: Determines the width of fixed-width or owner-draw tabs and the height of all tabs.

trans-unit.target: 无法将 TableLayoutSettings 转换为 string: 在控件上找不到 "Name" 字符串属性。

trans-unit.target: 指定 TextBox 控件的 PlaceholderText。当 Text 属性为 null 或为空时，在控件中显示 PlaceholderText，并且该文本可用于指导用户输入控件所需的内容。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the text in the edit control can be changed or not.

trans-unit.target: 在将要更改选定内容时发生。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether check boxes are displayed beside nodes.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否在节点旁显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the system or the user paints the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 控制系统或用户是否绘制节点。

trans-unit.source: Occurs in owner-draw mode, when a node needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当需要绘制节点时，在所有者描述模式下发生。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the highlight spans the width of the TreeView.
trans-unit.target: 指示突出显示是否跨越 TreeView 的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Removes highlight from the selected node when control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 当控件没有焦点时从选定节点移除突出显示。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether nodes give feedback when the mouse is moved over them.
trans-unit.target: 指示当鼠标移到节点上时，节点是否提供反馈。

trans-unit.source: The default image index for nodes.
trans-unit.target: 节点的默认图像索引。

trans-unit.source: The default image key for nodes.
trans-unit.target: 节点的默认图像键。

trans-unit.source: The ImageList control from which node images are taken.
trans-unit.target: 从中获取节点图像的 ImageList 控件。

trans-unit.source: The indentation width of child nodes in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 子节点的缩进宽度(以像素为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The height of every node in the TreeView.
trans-unit.target: 树视图中各节点的高度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the user can edit the label text of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户是否可以编辑节点的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The color of the lines that connect the nodes of the TreeView.
trans-unit.target: 连接树视图节点的线条的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is clicked with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用鼠标单击节点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is double-clicked with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用鼠标双击节点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse hovers over a TreeNode.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标悬停在 TreeNode 上时发生。

trans-unit.source: The sorting comparer for the TreeView.
trans-unit.target: 树视图的排序比较器。

trans-unit.source: The root nodes in the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: TreeView 控件中的根节点。

trans-unit.source: The string delimiter used for the path returned by a node's FullPath property.
trans-unit.target: 用于由节点的 FullPath 属性返回的路径的字符串分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the control will display scroll bars if it contains more nodes than can fit in the visible area.
trans-unit.target: 指示当控件包含过多的节点，无法在可见区域中全部显示时，该控件是否将显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The default image index for selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 选定节点的默认图像索引。

trans-unit.source: The default image for selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 选中节点的默认图像。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected node, or null if no node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定的节点，或者在未选择任何节点时为空。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether lines are displayed between sibling nodes and between parent and child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否在同级节点之间以及父节点和子节点之间显示连线。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if plus/minus buttons are shown next to parent nodes.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否在父节点旁边显示加/减按钮。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether lines are displayed between root nodes.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否在根节点之间显示连线。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether ToolTips will be displayed on the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否显示节点的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether nodes are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否对节点进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The ImageList control used by the TreeView for custom states.
trans-unit.target: 树视图用于表示自定义状态的 ImageList 控件。

trans-unit.source: The first visible node in the TreeView.
trans-unit.target: 树视图中的第一个可见节点。

trans-unit.source: The number of visible nodes in the TreeView.
trans-unit.target: 树视图中可见节点的数目。

trans-unit.source: Type {0} in the data at line {1}, position {2} cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 未能在行 {1}、位置 {2} 的数据中找到类型 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Type {0} cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 未能找到类型 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Controls added to this collection must be of type '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 添加到此集合的控件必须为“{0}”类型。

trans-unit.source: Controls added to this collection must be of type '{0}' or '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 添加到此集合的控件必须为“{0}”或“{1}”类型。

trans-unit.source: Unable to initialize component.
trans-unit.target: 无法初始化组件。

trans-unit.source: Unable to set the panel text.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置面板文本。

trans-unit.source: Clipboard contains an unexpected type.
trans-unit.target: 剪贴板包含意外的类型。

trans-unit.source: The specified Clipboard format is not compatible with '{0}' type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的剪贴板格式与“{0}”类型不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Unknown ATTRIBUTE type.
trans-unit.target: 未知的 ATTRIBUTE 类型。

trans-unit.source: Unknown layout
trans-unit.target: 未知的布局

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how the up-down control will position the up and down buttons relative to its edit box.
trans-unit.target: 指示 up-down 控件如何相对于其编辑框定位“上移”和“下移”按钮。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the border style of the up-down control.
trans-unit.target: 指示 up-down 控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Down
trans-unit.target: 向下键

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the up-down control will increment and decrement the value when the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 指示当按下上箭头键和下箭头键时，up-down 控件是否将增加和减少该值。

trans-unit.source: The preferred height of this control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件的首选高度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the edit box is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 指示编辑框是否为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how the text should be aligned in the edit box.
trans-unit.target: 指示文本在编辑框中的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Up
trans-unit.target: 向上键

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether text rendering should be compatible with previous releases of Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本呈现是否应该与早期版本的 Windows 窗体兼容。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the panel should have a border.
trans-unit.target: 指示面板是否应具有边框。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user control loads.
trans-unit.target: 每当用户控件加载时发生。

trans-unit.source: Visual Style handle creation operation did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 视觉样式句柄创建操作失败。

trans-unit.source: Visual Styles-related operation resulted in an error because no visual style is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 当前没有活动的视觉样式，因此与视觉样式相关的操作导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Visual Styles-related operation resulted in an error because visual styles are currently disabled in the client area.
trans-unit.target: 视觉样式当前在工作区中被禁用，因此与视觉样式相关的操作导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Given combination of Class, Part, and State is not defined by the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 类、部分和状态的给定组合在当前视觉样式中没有定义。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support AllowDrop. Use AllowWebBrowserDrop to allow the WebBrowser to process drag/drop.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 AllowDrop。 请使用 AllowWebBrowserDrop 以允许 WebBrowser 处理拖/放操作。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the WebBrowser control can browse to another page after initially loading.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WebBrowser 控件是否可以在最初加载之后导航到另一个网页。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the WebBrowser control will receive drop notifications.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WebBrowser 控件是否接收拖动通知。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support the BackgroundImageLayout property.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 BackgroundImageLayout 属性。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support the BackgroundImage property.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 BackgroundImage 属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the availability of a previous page in the Web browser navigation history changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 Web 浏览器导航历史记录中上一页的可用性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the availability of a next page in the Web browser navigation history changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 Web 浏览器导航历史记录中下一页的可用性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support the Cursor property.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 Cursor 属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document hosted in the Web browser control is fully loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 浏览器控件中承载的文档全部加载后发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the title text changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当标题文本更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support the Enabled property.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 Enabled 属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever encryption level changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当加密级别更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a file download occurs.
trans-unit.target: 文件下载发生时发生。

trans-unit.source: Adding a WebBrowser control in Internet Explorer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持在 Internet Explorer 中添加 WebBrowser 控件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the Web browser control operates in offline mode.
trans-unit.target: 确定 Web 浏览器控件是否以脱机模式运行。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to use the context menu of the native web browser.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否使用本机 Web 浏览器的上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to a relative URL unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 导航到相对 URL 失败。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after WebBrowser navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在 WebBrowser 导航发生后发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before WebBrowser navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在 WebBrowser 导航发生前发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new window is created for the WebBrowser.
trans-unit.target: 在为 WebBrowser 创建新的窗口时发生。

trans-unit.source: IWebBrowser2 get from the native ActiveX control did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 从本机 ActiveX 控件获取 IWebBrowser2 失败。

trans-unit.source: ObjectForScripting's class must be visible to COM. Verify that the object is public, or consider adding the ComVisible attribute to your class.
trans-unit.target: ObjectForScripting 的类必须对 COM 可见。 请确认该对象是公共的，或考虑向您的类添加 ComVisible 特性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an update to the progress of a download occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当更新下载进度发生时发生。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support the RightToLeft property.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 RightToLeft 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the WebBrowser control shows script errors in dialogs boxes.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WebBrowser 控件是否在对话框中显示脚本错误。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the WebBrowser control should have scrollbars or not.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WebBrowser 控件是否应该有滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The level of security permissions the hosted documents are granted.
trans-unit.target: 授予寄宿文档的安全权限级别。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the status text changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当状态文本更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support the Text property.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 Text 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the URL that the Web browser control has navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Web 浏览器控件导航到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowser control does not support the UseWaitCursor property.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowser 控件不支持 UseWaitCursor 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether some accelerator keys are enabled in the WebBrowser control.
trans-unit.target: 指定在 WebBrowser 控件中是否启用某些快捷键。

trans-unit.source: Width must be greater than MinWidth.
trans-unit.target: 宽度必须大于 MinWidth。

trans-unit.source: Failed to set Win32 parent window of the Control.
trans-unit.target: 未能设置控件的 Win32 父窗口。

trans-unit.source: SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault must be called before the first IWin32Window object is created in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序中创建第一个 IWin32Window 对象之前，必须调用 SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault。

trans-unit.source: Setting event '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 正在设置事件“{0}”

trans-unit.source: The border style of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever this collection's membership changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当此集合的成员更改时发生。

trans-unit.target: 每当此集合的成员要更改时发生。

trans-unit.target: 每当需要绘制特定项/区域时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever a particular item's height needs to be calculated.
trans-unit.target: 每当需要计算特定项的高度时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the SelectedIndex property changes.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.target: 当前选定项的索引。

trans-unit.target: 当从下拉列表中选择项而下拉列表关闭时发生。
